pkgmetadata.longdescription: Core Dashboard Registry App===========================Resource management via a dashboard for the registry core project.Quickstart==========1. Add "core_dashboard_registry_app" to your INSTALLED_APPS setting-------------------------------------------------------------------.. code:: python INSTALLED_APPS = [ ... 'core_dashboard_registry_app', ]2. Include the core_dashboard_registry_app URLconf in your project urls.py--------------------------------------------------------------------------.. code:: python url(r'^dashboard/', include('core_dashboard_registry_app.urls')),
